overview: Rajeev is the co-founder and COO at eXacly.me. He is a management executive with more than 15 years of experience in business process design, operations improvement, project management, cost management, and financial analysis. He is a former management consultant with Deloitte Consulting who has executed complex projects for startups and major corporations in the US and overseas, within time and budget. Rajeev has an MBA from Rotterdam School of Management (a top 5 business school in Europe) in conjunction with UNC Chapel Hill.
